recipe.hot: 1 shot of espresso in the white cup (smaller cup so the taste wont be watery)
recipe.cold: 1 shot of espresso in tall glass filled with ice all the way. If the cup not full after pouring the espresso, then add a little ice water and fill the rest with ice. Put more ice than water so that the taste won’t be water when customer takes the first sip.

recipe.hot: Mix espresso with 1 table spoon of salted caramel. Steam milk like latte and pour. Then drizzle a little salted caramel over the foam.
recipe.cold: Drizzle the caramel in  a glass of ice then pour ½ of the glass with milk. Pour a little milk in the white pitcher and mix the milk with the salted caramel. Then pour that milk in the tall glass. Then pour espresso in the end.

recipe.hot: 1 shot espresso in the brown cup and steam the milk with more foam than latte.
recipe.cold: Put ice in the tall glass and fill ½ with milk. Then pour espresso. After that steam a little bit of milk with a lot of foam and put the foam layer at the top. Add a little cocoa powder over the foam once done.

recipe.hot: Mix 1 table spoon of honey with 1 shot of espresso. Steam milk like latte and pour.
recipe.cold: fill glass with ice and pour two table spoon of honey. Fill the glass with milk. Mix some milk In the white pitcher with 1 teaspoon of honey and pour in the glass. Pour espresso in the glass after.

recipe.hot: For flat white recommend to customer who can’t take strong coffee cos it is more milk and less foam. When steaming the milk, don’t make too much foam.
recipe.note: Flat white is only available in hot, no cold. If cold its just iced latte.

recipe.hot: 1 shot espresso in the brown cup and steam the milk with more foam than latte.
recipe.cold: Put ice in the tall glass and fill ½ with milk. Then pour espresso. After that steam a little bit of milk with a lot of foam and put the foam layer at the top. Add a little cocoa powder over the foam once done

recipe.hot: Cut teabag string and put in the brown cup. Fill all  the way with hot water.
recipe.cold: let the tea set for 5 mins then put in a cup of ice and add 5ml sugar if needed.

recipe.hot: Take Chamomile teabag from the desk and put in the tea cup. Fill all the way with hot water.
recipe.cold: N/A

recipe.hot: Cut teabag string and put in the brown cup. Fill all  the way with hot water.
recipe.cold: let the tea set for 5 mins then put in a cup of ice and add 5ml sugar if needed.
N/A
Put ice and ready made tea from the chiller
recipe.note: Recipe For Big Jar: 2-3 tea bag of bow tea and fill up 3/4 water of big jar, then put 900gm suger and 900gm lemau cordial (test and add lemon or sugar if test not perfect)

recipe.cold: Put ice and ready made tea from the chiller
recipe.note: Recipe for the jog: 4 table spoon of bow tea, then add hot water small glass jar and fill up the jug until full with the tea water

recipe.hot: Mix 3 teaspoon of cocoa powder and 1 table spoon of Hershey syrup. Mix with very little hot water to melt the chocolate. Steam milk like latte and pour
2 shots of walnut brownie syrup in the milk and mix. Pour mixed milk in pitcher and steam
recipe.cold: 3 shots of the syrup mix with the milk and pour in a  glass of ice

recipe.hot: In the brawn cup put, 2 table spoon of Milo Powder and melt with hot water and put a bit milk on the top
recipe.cold: In the long glass put, 4 table spoon of Milo Powder and melt with hot water, put some ice and put a bit milk on the top

recipe.hot: N/A
recipe.cold: In the long glass put, 1/5 dark sugar, then put 2/5 evaporated milk, then add the ready made teh tarik
recipe.note: Teh Tarik: add 6 table spoon bow tea in glass jar, then put the tea water in the add condensed milk

recipe.hot: 2 spoon bow tea and add condensed milk
recipe.cold: In the long glass put, ice cube and add ready made tea tarik
recipe.note: Teh Tarik: add 6 table spoon bow tea in glass jar, then put the tea water in the add condensed milk

recipe.hot: 1 pack Kopi O bag and hot water both put in the tea cup
recipe.cold: 2 pack Kopi O bag mix with hot water then use the long glass, put some ice and the mixed Kopi O water.

recipe.hot: N/A
recipe.cold: In blender put 3 scoop vanilla, then 5 pcs ice cube, add 200ml milk, then put in milkshake glass, add whipping cream and on it put some caramel syrup and put a cherry on top.

recipe.hot: N/A
recipe.cold: In blender put 3 scoop vanilla, then 1 table spoon Nutella, 4 pcs ice cube, add 200ml milk, then put in milkshake glass, add whipping cream and on it put some chocolate syrup.

recipe.hot: N/A
recipe.cold: In blender put 3 scoop vanilla, then 2 table spoon biscoff, 4 pcs ice cube, add 200ml milk, then put in milkshake glass, add whipping cream and on it put some biscoff powder.

recipe.hot: N/A
recipe.cold: In blender put 3 scoop vanilla, add 6 pump strawberry monin syrup, 4 pcs ice cube, add 200ml milk, then put in milkshake glass, add whipping cream and on it put 5 marshmallow and put half strawberry on top.

recipe.cold: In blender put 3 scoop vanilla, add 6 pump strawberry monin syrup, 4 pcs ice cube, add 200ml milk, then put in milkshake glass, add whipping cream and on it put 5 marshmallow and put half strawberry on top.
